ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Question
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings Bilt, I did as you suggested and nothing was found abnormal. I think I finely figured out how to save my face *knock on wood* but my inventory
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings Bilt,
I did as you suggested and nothing was found abnormal. I think I finely
figured out how to save my face *knock on wood* but my inventory picture is
still solid black!? Who knows!
Sincerely,
Deidre

>did you do a full scan of the files, already? maybe some files are broken.
>when you start EQ; before hitting "play",
>use the "advanced" button, and do a "Complete File Check". this takes some
>minutes, but it _may_ find corrupted
>files.
>
>
>good luck
> - bilt
>--
>Biltilie Dwimmerlaik
>level 53 female gnome magician
>Tarew Marr
